item.dc:creator: @yohojo yohojo
item.description:
@yohojo wrote:

guys.
leave him alone
this is a great script.
idc if its simple
it does EXACTLY what its spoed to.
why would someone wana steal this?
for credit? yeah right…
i think its a fine script fook
just maybye add a few more things like
a certain ammount of feathers to buy ect
but yeah
stop fleaming him for no reason!

item.title: Feather buyer by fooktard, works great
item.dc:creator: @fook fook
item.description:
@fook wrote:

took me about 2 seconds 2 write but it works great.

[scar]program featherbuyer;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

var
tenwhite: integer;

procedure loadbmps;
begin
tenwhite := BitmapFromString(15, 7, ‘z78DA7373C30E0C30002E594’ +
‘AF4D2DF644CF66036197F980C1E93F18709A62E00B8888FE9’);

end;

procedure buyingtenfeathers;
begin
mouse(378, 81,10,10,false);
wait(100+random(20));
findbitmap(tenwhite,x,y);
wait(200+random(50));
mouse(x,y,10,10,true)
end;

begin
setupsrl;
loadbmps;
repeat
buyingtenfeathers;
until(false)
end.[/scar]

+rep if u like pl0x

Read full topic
item.source: Feather buyer by fooktard, works great
